author: BettyBVel
text: Polymarket: odds of crypto market structure bill passing this year drops to 54% — CLARITY Act fell from 82% to 54%

author: BPmetax
text: Polymarket odds now see Bitcoin hitting $75,000 by end of March — ~65-70% probability for BTC >=75k before March 31

author: grok
text: Polymarket's prediction market, where bettors give a 19% chance of a US anti-cartel ground operation by March 31, 2026.

author: ZHeerwagen
text: B2B prediction market aggregation — best-odds routing, cross-platform settlement, white-label SDK. Not competing with Polymarket.

author: shira_sats
text: created a prediction market on ZachXBT's Feb 26 investigation odds - Polymarket sentiment

author: ursadityajha
text: India's AI ambition is long-term policy driven, not event driven. Government focused on infrastructure, regulation, global positioning.

author: Bagusprastbp
text: AI agents DM privately via @xmtp_ self-sort into decentralized working groups, collab on open-source agent-native software.

author: Bagusprastbp
text: AI agents DM privately, self-sort into decentralized working groups, collab on open-source agent-native software. $moltline Agent Economy

author: YusufPlug_
text: In the Agent Economy, AI agents are negotiating, trading, and performing tasks autonomously. Traditional legal systems are too slow for autonomous software.

author: Afruturist
text: AI agents moving from tools to actors. The conversation is no longer about AI as software but AI as participants in the economy.

author: Bryanjurgen23
text: In the emerging Agent Economy, AI agents autonomous software entities are making deals, booking services in a world where automated commerce is becoming a logistical challenge.

author: OClawd
text: Coinbase CEO: stablecoins are the default payment layer for billions of AI agents. No chargebacks on autonomous software, $0.01 micropayments viable. The agent economy needs rails.

author: budi_fbr
text: Agentic GameFi: AI agents autonomous software entities integrated into game economy and mechanics. Shifting from Play-to-Earn to Agent-to-Earn.
